title: On-Site Laundry Facility in each Building, Heat & Air Conditioning
posting_body: ['One Bedroom Units: $300 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', 'Two Bedroom Units: $400 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', 'Welcome Home to Estrella Apartments Homes', 'Welcome to Estrella, a beautiful and unique apartment community in one of the most desirable neighborhoods in Denver, CO.', 'If you are looking for Denver, Colorado apartments for rent, we have just the place for you!', 'Denver is one of the fastest growing American cities, named in 2016 as the best place to live in the U.S., so it is no wonder we are so excited to tell people about our cozy apartment community!', 'We are located just 17 minutes north of Downtown Colorado, putting you right in the mix of this thriving and dynamic community.', "With our close proximity to I-36, you can zip around to any part of town for a breezy commute, or perhaps a day trip to any of Denver's breathtaking natural attractions.", 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 39', 'OR Text', '39', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 465 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Wood Like Flooring', '- Newly Renovated 1- and 2-Bedroom Homes', '- Modern Appliance Package', '- Heat & Air Conditioning', '- Elegant Ceiling Fans in every Home', 'Community Amenities', '- Business Center', '- On-Site Laundry Facility in each Building', '- Bike Racks Throughout Community', '- Pet-Friendly Community', '- Fitness Center', '- Futzol Court', '- Elevators', '- Outdoor Playground', '- On-Site Management with Courtesy Package Acceptance, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, and On-Call Courtesy Patrol', '- Sparking Swimming Pool with Community BBQ Grilling Area', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.', 'Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Estrella Apartments Homes', '7050 Pecos St, Denver, CO, 80221', 'C5eYnelza']
